


## Set up environment

1. Create local directory

2. In VS Code, install

    - Git
    - Quarto
    - Remote - SSH (should also install "Remote - SSH: Editing Configuration Files" and "Remote Explorer")

3. Create Containerfile (or Dockerfile)

4. Create requirements.txt

5. In VS Code:

   a. Open the project directory: File > Open Folder...
   b. View > Command Palette... > Dev Containers: Open Folder in Container > select project folder > select Dockerfile

   THe Docker image will now be built. This may take awhile the first time.
